thread.section_title: Hotel Le A - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean classy hotel 10 min walk to Arc of Triumph
thread.title_full: Clean classy hotel 10 min walk to Arc of Triumph - Review of Hotel Le A, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Olga Z
title: Clean classy hotel 10 min walk to Arc of Triumph
text:
"+"
* Good location close to Champs-Élysées
* Parking available, 30 EU night
* Clean, classy, modern design
* Wonderful staff, Pascale on reception was especially wonderful
* Small but lovely basic rooms, L'Occitane toiletries provided. Bathrobe slippers and all worth 4*
* Breakfast available - did not take it
* Cafe/bistro right opposite
*-*
* Rooms are pretty small
* Late at night can not provide Valet parking, got to sort it our yourself
Overall, I would definitely recommend! Great deals available online!
Room Tip: No difference floor wise See more room tips
